title: Beyond Ubuntu: Other Linux Distributions You Should Try
author: Jack Wallen
description: Tired of the same old Linux Distributions? Here are a few up-and-comers — Serpent OS, Solus, Manjaro, Nobara — that will enliven your desktop.
cntitle: 超越Ubuntu：你应该尝试的其他Linux发行版
cndescription: 厌倦了同样的老旧Linux发行版？这里有一些新兴的发行版——Serpent OS、Solus、Manjaro、Nobara——可以为您的桌面带来活力。
